oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, in a nastaʻlīq script in black ink, rubricated in red, 13 lines per page, with marginal corrections. Catchwords on the verso of each leaf.
Oriental paper. 17.7 x 13 cm. (11.5 x 8.5 cm.)
Bound in pasteboards covered in marble paper with dark brown leather on spine.

With: ʻAdad mā fī al-kitāb al-ʻazīz min al-āyāt ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam (ff. 29v-31v) -- Dhikr maʻrifat aḥzāb al-Qurʼān wa-anṣāfihi wa-arbāʻih / li-al-Shaykh ʻAlam al-Dīn al-Sakhāwī (ff. 32r-36v) -- Makhārij al-ḥurūf / li-Abī Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jaʻbarī (ff. 37r-40r).
According to colophon, copied in the hand of Aḥmad in Ramaḍān 1010 [1602] (fol. 28r).
MS Arab 379. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
